Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Aracnia looked up at her lover in pure and horrible pain. The thing 
inside was busting out, and if it wasnt transferred soon, it was going to 
kill the boh of them. She looked around and tried to remember in her groggy 
state where the hell she had seen a stasis pod laying around.
       "Cargo bay 17B....in the stacks. I hid it there under a web 
covering...." She moaned in between the horrible pains that shot all over her 
body. Her hard drive couldnt support both sparks at the same time, and an 
overload was beggining. "Hurry my love..."

--part1_58.3d7aecc.27545717_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
